title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class. The output is "MySomeClass".
OB: When running the code, the output is "MySomeAnn" instead of the expected output "MySomeClass".
EB: The expected behavior is for the code to output "MySomeClass".
